column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Before I visited Jinya
column2: I kept hearing comparisons between Jinya and Tiger Den. Not having been impressed at all by the blandness of my Tiger Den experience
column3: I was pretty skeptical about Jinya... The fianc√© has been raving about Jinya though
column4: so I finally went and am now hooked! Definitely my go-to place for ramen cravings from now on. The only thing missing on their menu is the brothless creamy ramen that Ninja Ramen carries
column5: but their super extensive menu options more than make up for it.
